duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching for all store employees.
Maintain high retention by focusing on identifying qualified applicants, developing leaders, empowering employees, and encouraging productivity.
Assist in implementing all merchandising and marketing programs.
Competency in cash handling, fuel transactions, and promoting loyalty program.
Maintaining a clean, safe environment by complying with all health and sanitation procedures.
Excellent oral and written communication and intrapersonal skills.
Proficient computer knowledge, including Microsoft products.
